title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Viral Map Creation and Diffusion Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental GIS (Geographic Information System) comprehension, social media platform utilization, and basic data visualization skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of viral maps and social media diffusion mechanisms.
Learners can analyze visual design elements of viral maps using machine learning tools.
Learners can propose and implement effective viral map creation strategies based on case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
